name: Memory Girl +
storyline:
Memory awakens inside the data of a game, fully conscious. She walks through a fictional version of Tokyo searching for clues to the whereabouts of "him."
She meets and gathers information from the quirky residents of Tokyo, including her best friend Messiah, her classmate who works at the arcade Cult, and the mysterious lone elementary student Lime.
Memory's choices will influence the direction of the story, and terrifyingly unexpected events may also occur…
Beautiful graphics and memorable music will immerse you in the mystery and horror of this game.

In this world full of emotion, terrifying and unpredictable
twists and turns await you.

Come along and see Memory's story through to the end…
summary: A tragic love story of Memory and her search for the missing "him." Fully conscious but trapped in the data of a game someone abandoned, Memory searches for "him."
